name: 6. Neon Minimal
description: Dark minimalist theme with Poppins and Open Sans fonts
instructions: Create a minimal dark aesthetic with Poppins headings and Open Sans body text. Use aqua (#26C6DA) for primary accents and pink (#F06292) for highlights. Modern, vibrant, and attention-grabbing.

image_style.prompt: Create minimal, vibrant images with neon-inspired colors. Use aqua (#26C6DA) and pink (#F06292) accents on very dark backgrounds (#0D0D0D). Style should feel modern, energetic, and attention-grabbing.
